parameters.name: catalog_name
parameters.description: (string) Name of parent catalog for tables of interest.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of tables to return. If not set, all the tables are returned (not recommended).

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Opaque token to send for the next page of results (pagination).

parameters.name: include_delta_metadata
parameters.description: Whether delta metadata should be included in the response.

parameters.name: omit_columns
parameters.description: Whether to omit the columns of the table from the response or not.

parameters.name: omit_properties
parameters.description: Whether to omit the properties of the table from the response or not.

parameters.name: omit_username
parameters.description: Whether to omit the username of the table (e.g. owner, updated_by, created_by) from the response or not.

parameters.name: include_browse
parameters.description: Whether to include tables in the response for which the principal can only access selective metadata for

parameters.name: include_manifest_capabilities
parameters.description: Whether to include a manifest containing capabilities the table has.

200.description: The tables list was successfully retrieved.

get.description: Gets an array of all tables for the current metastore under the parent catalog and schema. The caller must be a metastore admin or an owner of (or have the
